item.title: You Have a Date Next Thursday
item.description: Of course you do. It’s at 7:00 at the Crowne Plaza in Clayton. The Crowne Plaza Grille, to be precise. April 19. It’s the April After Party, and the topic is the Missouri plan. Your mission: bring one friend who’s never been to a Tea Party event. If you can’t find someone to bring, come anyway. Thinking about skipping? Don’t. The most important election since Lincoln’s first is just seven months away.
